name: AndroidMic
description: Use your Android phone as a microphone for your PC
readme_summary: AndroidMic allows you to use your Android phone as a wireless or USB microphone for your PC. It supports multiple platforms and includes features like noise cancellation and audio visualization.
primary_use_case: Using an Android phone as a PC microphone.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, anthropomorphic Android robot holding a vintage microphone, with sound waves flowing wirelessly from the microphone towards a laptop computer. The laptop screen displays a waveform visualization. Subtle digital particles emanate from the connection points, suggesting data transfer. The scene is set against a clean, modern background with the 'AndroidMic' logo subtly integrated into the environment. The overall mood is innovative and user-friendly, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a bright, clear color palette.

name: js-draw
description: Draw pictures using a pen, touchscreen, or mouse! JS-draw is a freehand drawing library for JavaScript and TypeScript.
readme_summary: js-draw is a freehand drawing library for JavaScript and TypeScript, enabling users to create and manipulate drawings with a wide zoom range, touch support, and customizable tools. It outputs drawings in SVG format and supports collaborative editing.
key_features: Touchscreen and stylus support with gesture recognition
Saving to and loading from SVG
primary_use_case: To provide a robust and flexible JavaScript library for building freehand drawing applications with advanced features like infinite zoom and touch support.
cover_image_prompt: A magical artist's studio where a digital quill hovers over an infinitely expanding canvas. The quill draws intricate lines that morph into vibrant, complex illustrations, representing the vast zoom capabilities. Subtle UI elements, like floating tool palettes and a small, glowing SVG icon, are visible. The scene is bathed in soft, creative light, with digital particles flowing from the quill. The repository name 'js-draw' is subtly etched into a wooden easel in the background. The style is a whimsical 3D isometric illustration with a clean, inviting color palette.

name: youtube-smart-speed
description: [TESTING]: Intelligent YouTube playback speed control using AI. Automatically speeds up during silence and slows down during speech. Fully configurable by user.
readme_summary: YouTube Smart Speed is a Firefox extension that uses AI to intelligently adjust YouTube video playback speed. It automatically speeds up during silences and slows down during speech, with fully customizable settings and machine learning capabilities.
key_features: Intelligent speed control using AI audio analysis
Machine learning for usage pattern adaptation
Popup and Options page for interface control
primary_use_case: To enhance the YouTube viewing experience by optimizing playback speed to reduce wasted time during silences and improve comprehension during speech.
cover_image_prompt: A conductor standing in front of a YouTube play button, wielding a baton that glows with digital energy. As the conductor gestures, the play button transforms into a dynamic waveform: during silent passages, the waveform stretches and speeds up, depicted by bright, fast-moving lines; during spoken dialogue, the waveform compresses and slows down, shown by denser, slower-moving lines. Subtle UI elements showing speed percentages float around the conductor. The background is a clean, modern digital space with a soft blue and purple color scheme. The style is a 3D isometric illustration with clear, bold outlines and a focus on the visual metaphor of controlling audio flow.

name: QualityScaler
readme_summary: QualityScaler is a Windows application that uses AI to enhance, upscale, and de-noise images and videos. It leverages deep learning models and supports various hardware accelerators for efficient processing directly on the user's PC.
key_features: Support for multiple GPUs (NVIDIA, AMD, Intel)
Automatic image tiling for VRAM limitation
primary_use_case: Enhancing and upscaling the quality of images and videos using AI on a Windows PC.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist meticulously restoring a faded, low-resolution photograph and a grainy video clip. The artist uses a magical brush that glows with AI energy, transforming the input into a sharp, vibrant, high-definition image and a crystal-clear video. Small, subtle UI elements showing resolution scaling and noise reduction sliders are visible on a nearby digital tablet. The background is a clean, modern workspace with glowing data streams flowing from the artist's tools. The overall mood is one of transformation and clarity. The art style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a focus on detail and a clean, futuristic aesthetic, with the repository name 'QualityScaler' subtly integrated into the digital interface.

name: youtube-ai-extension
description: Interactive YouTube extension built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Plasmo. It integrates with the OpenAI API to enable real-time video chat, providing summaries, Q&A, and context-aware responses directly on YouTube.
readme_summary: This repository provides an interactive Chrome extension for YouTube that leverages the OpenAI API to enable real-time chat with video content. Users can get summaries, ask questions, and receive context-aware responses directly within the YouTube interface.
primary_use_case: Enhancing the YouTube viewing experience by allowing users to interact with video content through an AI-powered chat interface.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, friendly robot assistant perched on the edge of a YouTube video player, holding a glowing speech bubble. The speech bubble contains a miniature, simplified representation of the video's content being summarized or answered. Below the robot, subtle lines of code and data flow into the video player, symbolizing the AI's integration. The background is a clean, modern interface, hinting at a browser window. The overall mood is helpful and intelligent, with a focus on clarity and ease of use. The art style should be a vibrant 3D isometric illustration with soft lighting and a focus on the interaction between the robot, the speech bubble, and the video player.
